title: Teriyaki
description: Succulent grilled chicken or tofu glazed with our signature teriyaki sauce, served with steamed rice and a side of mixed vegetables.

title: Dumplings
description: Delight in a plate of perfectly steamed or pan-fried dumplings, filled with your choice of juicy pork or flavorful vegetable and mushroom. Served with a tangy dipping sauce.

title: Karaage
description: Crispy on the outside, tender on the inside, our karaage offers bite-sized pieces of marinated chicken or tofu, deep-fried to golden perfection.

title: Soba
description: Slurp up a steaming bowl of buckwheat soba noodles in a savory broth, garnished with scallions, tempura, and nori seaweed. Choose from a variety of toppings

title: Sushi
description: Emmerse yourself in a world of sushi artistry with our chef's selection of the freshest, handpicked fish and expertly crafted rolls.

title: Ramen
description: Experience the ultimate comfort in a bowl with our rich and flavorful ramen. Choose from a variety of broth options, including tonkotsu, shoyu, or miso.
